A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's fantastic. It's beyond fantastic. It has themes\, it has heart\, it has female characters as actual human beings! \n\nYou might not like it\, that does not make it a bad movie. It's thought provoking\, lovingly shot\, well written and well characterized. I loved it more than almost any other film I'd ever seen\, it's quite possibly my favorite. Don't let the past rob you of your future. Spoiler\, a big theme of the movie.
